response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has the potential to revolutionize your business operations and significantly enhance your profitability. This product, while valued at $1,000,000 to us, holds the key to unlocking new opportunities for growth and efficiency. We understand that the true value of this product may be subjective and varies based on your specific needs and goals. Therefore, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. This exclusive offer is designed to help you maximize your investment and achieve unparalleled results. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 850000}
